info.title: IF2LEVA3 - Preview
info.description: performis IF2LEVA3 | Interface for leva+ base, scheduling and workshop

parameters.name: X-RequestingSystem
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-RequestingUser
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical ID (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: searchString
parameters.description: Optional search string for looking up a record within name and searchterm fields.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of records to skip for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return.

parameters.name: changesSinceDateTime
parameters.description:
Get all the entities which were added/edited since a specific datetime. Cannot be used together with search
parameters (searchString, internalAccessoryId,
externalAccessoryId).

parameters.name: changesSinceChangeID
parameters.description:
Get all the entities which were added/edited since the provided ChangeID. Cannot be used together with search
parameters (searchString, internalAccessoryId,
externalAccessoryId).

parameters.name: internalAccessoryId
parameters.description: Retrieve a specific record by internal accessory ID. Ignores other search options if provided.

parameters.name: externalAccessoryId
parameters.description: Retrieve a specific record by external accessory ID. Ignores other search options if provided.

get.description: By passing in the appropriate options, the service searches for available accessories in the system.

put.summary: Create or update an existing accessory in LEVA+.

parameters.name: X-RequestingSystem
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-RequestingUser
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical ID (GUID) for call identification.

requestBody.description:
New or updated accessory.
You may use your own ID.
The same DTO you receive from a GET is used. The change fields are not required.

put.description: Updates an existing accessory if internal nor external ID match. Creates an accessory if neither internal or external ID is provided or no matching record could be found.

parameters.name: changesSinceDateTime
parameters.description:
Get all the entities which were added/edited since a specific datetime. Cannot be used together with search
parameters (searchString, internalMachineId,
externalMachineId).

parameters.name: changesSinceChangeID
parameters.description:
Get all the entities which were added/edited since the provided ChangeID. Cannot be used together with search
parameters (searchString, internalMachineId,
externalMachineId).

parameters.name: internalMachineID
parameters.description: Retrieve a specific record by internal machine ID. Ignores other search options if provided.

parameters.name: externalMachineID
parameters.description: Retrieve a specific record by external machine ID. Ignores other search options if provided.

get.description: By passing in the appropriate options, the service searches for available machine(s) in the system.

put.summary: Create or update an existing Machine in LEVA+.

parameters.name: X-RequestingSystem
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-RequestingUser
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical ID (GUID) for call identification.

requestBody.description:
New or updated machine.
You may use your own ID.
The same DTO you receive from a GET is used. The change fields are not required.

put.description: Updates an existing machine if internal nor external ID match. Creates a machine if neither internal or external ID is provided or no matching record could be found.

get.summary: Get machine type data from LEVA+.

parameters.name: X-RequestingSystem
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-RequestingUser
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical ID (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: searchString
parameters.description: Optional search string for looking up a record within name and searchterm fields.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of records to skip for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return.

parameters.name: changesSinceDateTime
parameters.description:
Get all the entities which were added/edited since a specific datetime. Cannot be used together with search
parameters (searchString, internalMachineTypeId,
externalMachineTypeId).

parameters.name: changesSinceChangeID
parameters.description:
Get all the entities which were added/edited since the provided ChangeID. Cannot be used together with search
parameters (searchString, internalMachineTypeId,
externalMachineTypeId).

parameters.name: internalMachineTypeID
parameters.description: Retrieve a specific record by internal machine type ID. Ignores other search options if provided.

parameters.name: externalMachineTypeID
parameters.description: Retrieve a specific record by external machine type ID. Ignores other search options if provided.

get.description: By passing in the appropriate options, the service searches for available machine type(s) in the system.

put.summary: Create or update an existing machine type in LEVA+.

requestBody.description:
New or updated machine type.
You may use your own ID.
The same DTO you receive from a GET is used. The change fields are not required.

put.description: Updates an existing machine type if internal nor external ID match. Creates a machine type if neither internal or external ID is provided or no matching record could be found.

requestBody.description:
Submit a full report Dto for creation.
Reports can not be altered by the interface after creation. Once a report is created it needs to be processed or deleted within leva+

AccessoryDisplayType.description:
Possible values for performis.Bau.IF2BHTR.Core.Dtos.AccessoryDto.AccessoryDisplayType property.
- `NONE`: Accessory without identification nor quantity
- `IDENTIFICATION`: Accessory with identification
- `QUANTITY`: Accessory with quantity

AccessoryDto.description: Data transfer object of a LEVA+ `Accessory` master data entry.

AccessoryID.description: Technical identification number of the accessory.

ExternalAccessoryID.description: External technical identification number of the accessory - may be used instead of performis.Bau.IF2BHTR.Core.Dtos.AccessoryDto.AccessoryID.

Active.description: Is this accessory active or not.

NumberOfItems.description:
The exact number of available accessories.
Required if performis.Bau.IF2BHTR.Core.Dtos.AccessoryDto.AccessoryDisplayType is set to `QUANTITY`.

Identification.description:
Identification or serial number of the accessory.
Required if performis.Bau.IF2BHTR.Core.Dtos.AccessoryDto.AccessoryDisplayType is set to `IDENTIFICATION`.

BranchCode.description: C4562 identification code of the branch to which the machine belongs to.

IsExternalResource.description: A value indicating whether the resource is external.

DispositionGroupCode.description:
C4542 code of the accessory's grouping that combines accessories of the same type and use
(not necessarily the same model or manufacturer).

OwnerCompanyNo.description: The number of the company that owns the accessory.

DispositionGroups.description:
List of additional disposition groups. A disposition group combines accessories of the same type and use
(not necessarily the same model or manufacturer).

Application.description:
Possible values for performis.Bau.IF2BBA.Core.Dtos.MachineDto.MachineUsages property.
- `B_HTR`: LEVA+
- `B_SE`: Steine + Erden
- `B_TS`: Treibstoff
- `B_WKST`: Werkstatt

ApplicationDto.description: Data transfer object of a machine's application usage.

AttributeSetID.description: Performis internal of attribute set ID

AttributSetDescription.description: Description / Title of the attribute set

CodeID.description: Technical ID of parent code, do not use

Value.description: The value as characters assigned of the according code detail

ValueNumeric.description: If the code detail is numeric, the value in addition provided as numeric value.

CodeType.description: Performis CodeType - the code type. E.g. 27 for PaymentTerms

CompanyNo.description: Company for which the code is valid. If company no is 0, the code is valid for all companies

CodeNo.description: Performis Code - the first four digits are the entry in a specific codetype, the next 1 to 4 digits are the codetype. E.g. 270001 is codetype 27 entry 0001

Text.description: The textual description of the code. E.g. Code 270001 is "30 days EOM".

ShortText.description: The short description of the code. E.g. Code 270001 is "30dEOM".

CompanyNo.description: Company no for which the codevalue is available. 0 = all companies

Text.description: Description or title of the codevalue

Shorttext.description: Short-description or title of the codevalue

CounterTypeCode.description: C4548 code of the counter type used in the machine, e.g. km, hours of operation.

Account.description: Account to post the counters against.

CounterDto.description: Data transfer object of a machine's counter.

DispositionGroupCode.description:
C4542 code of the machine grouping that combines machines of the same type and use
(not necessarily the same model or manufacturer).

DispositionGroupDto.description: Data transfer object of a machine's additional disposition group.

EmployeeID.description: Performis internal ID, must be supplied if ExternalEmployeeID is not.

ExternalEmployeeID.description: External employee ID, must be supplied if (internal) EmployeeID is not.

CompanyNo.description: Company for which the employee is listed

User.description: Performis database username of the employee

UserUPN.description: UPN of user - will be used to find a performis username for the employee

Description.description: The description of the employee. Automatically generated in the format: PersonalNo - FirstName LastName (ex. 1234 - John Smith)

BPIDEmployee.description: Internal partner ID of employee. Must be supplied if ExternalBPIDEmployee is not.

ExternalBPIDEmployee.description: External business partner ID for this employee. Must be supplied if (internal) BPIDEmployee is not.

OrganizationPath.description: The organisational part the employee works for.

Internal.description: true = employee is an employed by the organisation. false = e.g. external employee

Department.description: Name of the department the employee is a member of

Function.description: Position or title of the employee

BPAddrIDWorkplace.description: Business-partner address ID of the employees workplace. Must be supplied if ExternalGPAdrIDWorkplace is not.

ExternalBPAddrIDWorkplace.description: External business-partner address ID of the employees workplace. Must be supplied if (internal) GPAdrIDWorkplace ist not.

DriverBpID.description: Business partner ID of the driver.

ExternalDriverBpID.description: External business partner ID of the driver - may be used instead of performis.Bau.IF2BBA.Core.Dtos.MachineDriverDto.DriverBpID.

MachineDriverDto.description: Data transfer object of a machine's driver.

MachineID.description: Internal technical key for the machine.

ExternalMachineID.description: External technical key for machine - may be used instead of performis.Bau.IF2BBA.Core.Dtos.MachineDto.MachineID.

Active.description: Sets whether or not the machine may be used in LEVA+.

Description.description: Description (e.g. name, type, number) of the machine.

PlacingOnMarket.description: Date when the machine was first registered and used in the business. Important for service dates etc.

ExternalMachineTypeID.description:
External identification number for performis.Bau.IF2BBA.Core.Dtos.MachineTypeDto
- may be used instead of the performis.Bau.IF2BBA.Core.Dtos.MachineDto.MachineTypeID.

MachineGUID.description: Unique identifier for a machine. Used for communication with third party systems.

MachineNo.description: Identification number for a single machine.

AcquisitionDate.description: The date the machine was acquired.

ManufacturerCode.description: C4543 code of the machine manufacturer.

MasterNumber.description: A master number is used to assign and identify the vehicle.

TypeCertificateNumber.description: Official number for identification of the vehicle type by external entities.

ExternalOwnerBpAddrID.description: External address number of the owner.

ExternalLocationBpAddrID.description: External address number of the location.

InvoiceBpAddrID.description: Address number of the customer to invoice.

ExternalInvoiceBpAddrID.description: External address number of the customer to invoice.

RegularDriverBpID.description: Business partner ID of the regular driver.

ExternalRegularDriverBpID.description: External business partner ID of the regular driver.

CounterGroupCode.description: C4546 code of the counter group.

StandardTrailerMachineID.description: The identification number of the semi-trailer that is usually coupled with this machine.

ExternalStandardTrailerMachineID.description: The external identification number of the semi-trailer that is usually coupled with this machine.

MachineModelCode.description: C4541 code of the machine model, e.g. crane.

BranchCode.description: C4562 identification code of the branch to which the machine belongs.

IsExternalResource.description: Is this machine an external resource?

YearOfManufacture.description: The year in which the machine was built.

DispositionGroupCode.description: C4542 code of the machine disposition type.

LocationApiKey.description: API key to access location service for the machine.

IsMachineLocationSyncEnabled.description: Whether or not the machines location is automatically synced.

ManufacturerApiCode.description: C3306 code of the used location API connector.

EngineType.description: What type of engine does the machine have.

CostCenterNo.description: Number of the cost center this machine is billed internally to.

TelematicsDeviceGroupCode.description: C3336 code defining which telematics system the machine uses.

LastYearlyService.description: Date of the machine's last yearly service.

TypeOfDrives.description: List of type of drives of the machine.

DispositionGroups.description:
List of additional disposition groups. A disposition group combines machines of the same type and use
(not necessarily the same model or manufacturer). (E.g. a 20m boom, might be sold as 12m boom).

MachineDrivers.description: List of the business partner IDs of the driver/s that can use this machine.

Counters.description: List of counters of the machine.

AdditionalLine.description: Additional line of an address which is neither a street nor a post office box. For example, "c/o Samuel Schnelli" or "Office Samuel Schnelli".

ZipCode.description: Zipcode of the address in country-specific format. For example, "EC1A 1AA" for London, England or "9500" for Wil, Switzerland.

TypeOfDrive.description:
Typ of drive values.
- `B`: Petrol
- `H`: Hybrid
- `D`: Diesel
- `E`: Electric
